Using more of the energy of the [[Stone of Gelel]], the user takes on a monstrous transformation, further enhancing their strength and abilities. These enchancements also enables those who were not trained in combat to fight experienced opponents with ease.

== Forms ==
The transformation is different for each user, providing a variety of different abilities:

<gallery widths="170" columns="3" position="center" hideaddbutton="true">
Fugai's Werewolf Form.png|Fugai's werewolf transformation; allows her to produce powerful soundwaves.
Kamira's Bat Form.png|Kamira's bat transformation; enables her to produce illusions and smokescreens.
Ranke Transformed.png|Ranke's ape transformation; further enhances her strength and manipulation of plasma.
Haido's Grayish Humanoid Form.png|Haido's transformation; grants him a variety of abilities, among them being superhuman strength, speed and enhanced healing.
</gallery>
